channel.title: [508]Z508 - Clicking delay[508]

item.title: [508]Z508 - Clicking delay[508]
item.dc:creator: @monkey_money30 monkey money30
item.description:
@monkey_money30 wrote:

Hello,

I’m trying to add a clicking delay for 2 second, so people don’t get to keep clicking and get more spendingExperience.

This is what I need the click delay for:

case 299: //Haybales p.requestAnim(422, 0); p.spendingExperience += 2000; p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "You get another 2,000 experience to spend on any combat skill,"); p.getActionSender().sendMessage(p, "to check how much experience you have left to spend please do ::spendexp."); break;

I need a clicking delay of 2 seconds or if I can get 1.5 second that would be better but if not just 2 seconds.

Thank-you, please help if you can.

Read full topic
